patthana15.66:4.1: Pariyāpannaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naapariyāpanno nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.66:4.2: Apariyāpannaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naapariyāpanno nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.66:5.1: Pariyāpannaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naapariyāpanno naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
